mean_cn: adj. 可想像得到的，可想像的
mean_en: used with superlatives, and with all and every, to emphasize that something is the best, worst, etc. that you can imagine, or includes every possible example; possible to imagine
sentence: Paralysis is the greatest imaginable threat after his accident.
sentence_trans: 车祸之后，他能想到的最坏结果是瘫痪。
word_etyma: imagin想象 + able形容词后缀：可…的 → imaginable可想象的
